cmm.mainContent: CMM Inspection is the process of taking multiple sinle point measurements of 3D coordinates t o build a geometry.we have used several types of CMM Inspection that have different uses depending on the application.

contents.title: CONTACT
contents.content: Contact inspection is a process in which physical contact is made between the object to be inspected and the measurement device. Typically contact is achieved using a mechanical probe or other device that touches item, and allows the inspection procedure to occur. Types of contact inspection

contents.title: NON CONTACT
contents.content: Non-contact inspection is a technique in which we use a sensor to measure or gauge the desired features of the object. Types of non contact

contents.title: 3D COMPARISION INSPECTION
contents.content: A 3D analysis of surfaces as well as a 2D analysis of sections or points can be implemented in the software. CAD-based generation of primitives such as lines, planes, circles or cylinders is also possible .

proto.mainContent: We specialize in manufacturing high quality aesthetic prototypes we use rapid manufacturing techniques like High speed machining and 3D printing to deliver prototypes within a very short turn-around time.                     Prototypes can be fully functional and as per final design intent of customer      For such prototypes, we support customers for end-to-end processes like PCB design, PCB fabrication, machining, Surface coating (plating or vacuum metalizing), Final assembly.
